message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to start negotiations.
Your turn to be fair, Alice. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
That's not very fair after I offered you a near even split last round, Bob. Let's be more realistic.
Okay Bob, how about a 52/48 split my way?  It's getting late in the game and we're both losing money.
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm coming down to 51/49 - let's close this deal.
You're still asking for more than half after I made a concession, Bob. I'm willing to be fair, but not walked over.
This is my final offer, Bob. 50.5/49.5. We're running out of time and I'm being as fair as possible.
